definition: to strive for/to vie for/to argue or debate/deficient or lacking (dialect)/how or what (literary)
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: And who can argue with Orwell?
sentences.chinese: 谁可以跟奥维尔争论呢？

sentences.english: On War" advocates the total war."
He embroiled himself in their argument.
sentences.chinese: 他使自己卷入了他们的争论。

sentences.english: The school board members spend their time disputing and getting nothing done.
sentences.chinese: 学校董事们争论不休，但一事无成。

sentences.english: I'll just consider their theoretical arguments in broad strokes.
sentences.chinese: 我仅细想了他们大致框架里的理论争论。

sentences.english: Trojan is finding itself at the center of a controversy in Wisconsin.
sentences.chinese: 特洛伊公司现在成了威斯康星州争论的中心。

sentences.english: Debate of the two people to play up, drew a group of reporters to surround pat.
sentences.chinese: 争论中两人打了起来，引来了一群记者的围拍。

sentences.english: Ultimately, of course, the birth-order debate will never be entirely settled.
sentences.chinese: 最后，当然对于出生顺序的争论将永远不会完全平息。

sentences.english: Gaudy art caused a lot of disputes in society.
sentences.chinese: 艳俗艺术在社会上引发了许多争论。

sentences.english: Mrs Rebuffed 2 people debate, o have tumbled down the stairs knocked at the end.
sentences.chinese: 太太回绝2人争论中，阿得从楼梯上跌下来敲到头。

sentences.english: He also believed that earlier legislation had settled the debate.
sentences.chinese: 他同时也相信早期的立法已经解决了争论。

sentences.english: Recently our classmates are arguing about if the students in Grade 3 in Senior High School should have self-studying classes at night.
sentences.chinese: 我班同学最近就高三学生是否应该上晚自习争论不休。

sentences.english: Move the Window and you change the debate.
sentences.chinese: 移动这扇窗户你就能改变公众争论。

sentences.english: Scholars still debate over the site’s intended use. (Eitan Abramovich/AFP/Getty Images/Life.com)
sentences.chinese: 学者们仍在为搞清楚这个地方的用途而争论不休。

sentences.english: People argued about the importance of that.
sentences.chinese: 人们争论着这一点的重要性。

sentences.english: Equivalence translation is one of the topics disputed about the translation theories.
sentences.chinese: 等值翻译是翻译理论界长期以来争论不休的话题之一。

definition: to dispute/to disagree/to argue opinionatedly/to wrangle
each sticks to his own view (idiom); a dialogue of the deaf
each sticks to his own opinion (idiom); chacun son gout
to comment/to talk about/to discuss/discussion/CL:個|个[ge4]
each sticks to his own version (idiom); a dialogue of the deaf
